rows.label: qev090502_MSG0001
rows.name:
This was a damn massacre...
But where does it leave us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0002
rows.name: Hey. You've explored this region before, haven't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0003
rows.name: Any idea where Clarissa and her crew could be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0049
rows.name: Shake Head

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0050
rows.name: Claim that you have no idea.

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0051
rows.name: Deduce

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0052
rows.name: Say that this looks like the Ganglion's work.

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0004
rows.name: I see. Then hear me out as I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0005
rows.name:
The only thing that could have done this much
damage to a team with Skells is the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0006
rows.name: No indigens would be capable of such carnage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0007
rows.name:
And if it was the Ganglion,
past experience suggests they likely took prisoners.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0008
rows.name: What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0008_2
rows.name:
Shall we head to the nearest Ganglion base
and affect a rescue?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0009
rows.name: With our combined skills, we should have little to fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0010
rows.name:
Yes, this is a fine plan indeed.
Now enough of this lingering—let's move out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0011
rows.name: True, I can't imagine indigens would be capable of this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0012
rows.name:
But the Ganglion? Very possible. And if so,
they may have taken their prisoners to a nearby base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0013_m
rows.name: These are the benefits of a partner with experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0013_f
rows.name: These are the benefits of a partner with experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0014
rows.name:
Let's make for the nearest base.
Clarissa's waiting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0015
rows.name:
More Earth aliens. 
Come to watch us kill your people?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0016
rows.name:
If you lay a single finger on my student,
I promise you, I'll have you begging for death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0017
rows.name: Beg for death? Gwa ha ha! Earth alien is funny![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0018
rows.name:
Oh, I'm serious as the grave,
if you have the guts to try me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0019
rows.name: Then come. Save your friend...if you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0020
rows.name: If you make it to me...I will release her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0021
rows.name:
Don't do it! He killed them all!
He'll never keep his word! He—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0022
rows.name: SILENCE, Earth alien![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0023
rows.name: Aaugh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0024
rows.name: Believe or not. Choice is yours. But if you flee, she dies![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0025
rows.name: Let's go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0025_2
rows.name:
I'll not see another student of mine
murdered by some xeno animal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0026
rows.name:
Ho ho. Look who arrives.
Funny Earth aliens stronger than expected.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_JNK0030
rows.name: Demand

rows.label: qev090502_SEL0031
rows.name: Insist that the Prone release Clarissa as promised.

rows.label: qev090502_JNK0040
rows.name: Taunt

rows.label: qev090502_SEL0041
rows.name: Mock the Prone in order to draw their attention to you.

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0027
rows.name:
Ahh, yes. We did promise release, didn't we?
Very well. Now she will be freed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0028
rows.name: Silence! Wait your turn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0029
rows.name: All Earth aliens will be butchered in time. But first...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0029_02
rows.name: Aaaaah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ha! So much for show of suffering.
Earth aliens are frail. Die too quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0031
rows.name:
Damn you, xeno scum!
Why must you always be such monsters?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0032
rows.name: Monsters? No. Earth aliens are monsters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0033
rows.name:
Now scream! Scream as we kill you!
As all who stand against Ganglion scream![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0034
rows.name: I've failed them... Again...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0035
rows.name:
Dammit. They're gone... All gone!
All but Reggie stolen from me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0036
rows.name:
What good am I? What purpose do I serve
if I can't keep a single promise?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0057
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0058
rows.name:
Ask Bozé about the promise
he made to his students.

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0059
rows.name: Comfort

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0060
rows.name:
Remind Bozé that he has another
student right here.

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0037
rows.name:
Several of my students from the academy
were given spots aboard the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0038
rows.name:
Shortly before it launched,
they invited themselves into my home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0039
rows.name:
One last hurrah before leaving, they said.
And so we talked and drank until dawn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0040
rows.name:
And as the sun rose, I gave my word that we
would someday return to Earth together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0041
rows.name:
But the damn xenos killed them all.
First on Earth, and now here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0042
rows.name:
Now, I wish only pain and death on xenos.
They can never be forgiven![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0043_m
rows.name:
Yes, of course. And you're as precious
to me as any of the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0043_f
rows.name:
Yes, of course. And you're as precious
to me as any of the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0044
rows.name:
So I make you the same promise I did to them
on the day before the Whale took flight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0046
rows.name:
No matter what, I shall guard you with my life.
No xeno will ever take you from me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0047
rows.name: Hmm... Do you think it strange if I take Clarissa's dog tags?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090502_MSG0048
rows.name: I just want something of her to...live on back home.[ST:wait ]
